name: Jeremy Wrathall
content: Cornish Lithium values the work that Craig does supporting our staff in difficult times. Having experienced traumatic moments in my own life when I didn't know who to turn to, I am glad that members of my team have the opportunity to talk to Craig when such circumstances arise. I have always found him a thoughtful and compassionate person and therefore the ideal counsellor in troubled times. I would strongly commend Craig to others for the service he offers.
